thread.title: AMC Technology’s Contact Canvas 6.5 Solution Achieves Certified Integration with SAP® Applications
thread.title_full: AMC Technology’s Contact Canvas 6.5 Solution Achieves Certified Integration with SAP® Applications

author: Mariah Mays
title: AMC Technology’s Contact Canvas 6.5 Solution Achieves Certified Integration with SAP® Applications
text:
AMC Technology, L.L.C. today announced its Contact Canvas 6.5 solution has achieved certified integration with SAP® applications. The solution has been proven to integrate with the SAP Customer Relationship Management (SAP CRM), enabling call center agents to perform telephony functions supported by the toolbar in SAP CRM. The SAP Integration and Certification Center (SAP ICC) has certified that AMC Contact Canvas version 6.5 integrates with SAP CRM 7.0 Enhancement Package 3 application via the integration scenario SAP CRM Integrated Communication Interface – Computer Telephony Integration (CA-ICI-CTI) 3.07.
During certification, AMC Contact Canvas 6.5 has demonstrated the capabilities of agent login and work mode handling, telephony channel functions, conference handling, transfer handling, consultation handling, ongoing call handling, queue presence, agent presence, free seating, Dual-tone multi-frequency signaling (DTMF).
“We are delighted to announce the successful achievement of SAP certification for Contact Canvas 6.5,” said Aimee Stinson, Director of Strategic Alliances at AMC Technology. “The ability of Contact Canvas to leverage assets like CRM by integrating to Avaya, Cisco and Aspect can be the differentiator between mediocre customer service and superior customer service.”
As a result of the certified integration, Contact Canvas has proven to meet the requirements for enabling contact center agents to perform all telephony functions supported by the toolbar in SAP CRM. By demonstrating AMC’s continued support and ongoing dedication to providing SAP customers solutions that are interoperable with the CRM technology, customers know that their investment in Contact Canvas is a long term solution and that will meet its business needs now and in the future.
In addition, AMC Technology is member of the SAP PartnerEdge® program. Through the program, partners work closely with SAP to develop and certify the technical integration of their solutions with SAP software. Integrated partner applications extend, complement and add value to SAP solutions, thereby helping mutual customers more successfully meet business needs and
drive strong results.
About AMC Technology
AMC Technology is a global leader in contact center and CRM integration with 20 years dedicated to improving the customer experience. Founded in 1995, AMC Technology leads the market in providing contact center integration expertise and best practices. AMC powers contact centers and customer interactions for companies around the globe through its certiﬁed platform – Contact Canvas™ and unparalleled expertise. AMC products are certiﬁed by technology partners and allows businesses to more effectively manage all types of customer relationships while delivering superior levels of customer service and improving productivity.
AMC Technology, Contact Canvas, and all AMC Technology logos are trademarks of AMC Technology.
